description:
Day or night, this bright taillight will help you stand out. Equipped with an array of Chip on Board (COB) LEDs, the Mica 45 has a wide viewing angle that will help you keep you seen from behind.

  • 5 modes: high (2.5 hours at 45 lumens), low (4.5 hours at 24 lumens), quick flash (65 hours), slow flash (70 hours) and signal flash (3.5 hours)
  • Wide viewing angle keeps you seen
  • Efficient COB LEDs maintain brightness for more of the battery’s capacity
  • 1-button interface is easy to use with or without gloves
  • Mode memory starts your light in the last mode used
  • Horizontal or vertical mount
  • Easy USB charging means you no longer have to get by with "good enough" batteries
  • Lithium polymer battery is light and efficient
  • LED battery indicator lets you know when it's time to charge
  • Tool-free strap mount attaches to your seat post (standard or aero 22-35mm), or seat stays
  • O-ring seal makes this light ready for heavy rain – it's waterproof, but not submersible
name: MEC Mica 45 Rear Light
